sentences.sContent: But at the stern of the ship, divers found a trove of gold and silver and high-grade ceramics whose significance is more mysterious.
sentences.sContent_eng: But at the stern of the ship, divers found a trove of gold and silver and high-grade ceramics whose significance is more mysterious.
sentences.sCn: 但是潜水人员在船尾部发现了一个由金、银以及高级陶瓷打造的收藏品，这件收藏品的意义更加神秘。

phrases.pCn: n. 无主珍宝，无主埋藏物

trans.tranCn: 被发现的东西, 收藏的东西
